name: date-pick-it
description: A VueJs version of the popular AirBnb datepicker-monthpicker

scripts.build: rimraf dist/ && npm run build-main && npm run build-no-dep
scripts.build-no-dep: bili --outDir dist/no-dep --format umd,umd-min --plugin vue --vue.css dist/styles.css --no-inline --global.date-fns/format dateFns.format --global.date-fns/add_months dateFns.addMonths --global.date-fns/sub_months dateFns.subMonths --global.date-fns/get_days_in_month dateFns.getDaysInMonth --global.date-fns/is_before dateFns.isBefore --global.date-fns/is_after dateFns.isAfter --global.date-fns/is_valid dateFns.isValid --global.date-fns/is_same_month dateFns.IsSameMonth --global.date-fns/last_day_of_month dateFns.lastDayOfMonth --global.date-fns/start_of_month dateFns.startOfMonth --global.date-fns/sub_years dateFns.subYears --global.date-fns/add_years dateFns.addYears --global.date-fns/set_month dateFns.setMonth --global.date-fns/parse dateFns.parse --global.date-fns/is_same_day date-fns.is_same_day --global.date-fns/is_same_year date-fns.is_same_year --global.date-fns/start_of_year date-fns.start_of_year --global.date-fns/end_of_year date-fns.end_of_year

author: MikaelEdebro <mikael.edebro@gmail.com>
